name: OverlayPortal
desc: A widget that renders its overlay child on an [Overlay].

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: The controller to show, hide and bring to top the overlay child.

fields.name: overlayChildBuilder
fields.desc: A [WidgetBuilder] used to build a widget below this widget in the tree, that renders on the closest [Overlay].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: A widget below this widget in the tree.
